name: Castlevania Double Pack
overview: Castlevania Double Pack is a compilation cartridge of two previously released games: Harmony of Dissonance and Aria of Sorrow. There are some differences in Harmony of Dissonance: The Medusa Pendant, the Mirror Pendant and the Gold Headband were removed from this version. The Hint card that mentions the Summoning Tome calls the tome the "Black Scroll."
